project.name: C-C089C-FFMP-08-ST03-DT01-DF02-CF18-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C089C-FFMP-08-ST03-DT01-DF02-CF18-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Good inputs: 1) name of shipper for use in Sql databaseBad inputs:SQL argument injection

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="shipper1" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C089C-FFMP-08-ST03-DT01-DF02-CF18-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Good inputs: 1) name of shipper for use in Sql databaseBad inputs:SQL argument injection

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="BadShipper'), ('80','BadShipper2" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_BRtIOG7rxiKcGADeASWB AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_R7ys3VC5GT OR db_sql_output_GTUtyJyqBW OR database_insert_check_sf3aOByjAL) AND NOT timeout_OxhRPyFBSH) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_R7ys3VC5GT OR db_sql_output_GTUtyJyqBW OR database_insert_check_sf3aOByjAL) OR timeout_OxhRPyFBSH OR controlled_exit_hgHfSWQu2I)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_R7ys3VC5GT OR db_sql_output_GTUtyJyqBW OR database_insert_check_sf3aOByjAL) AND NOT timeout_OxhRPyFBSH) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_R7ys3VC5GT OR db_sql_output_GTUtyJyqBW OR database_insert_check_sf3aOByjAL) OR timeout_OxhRPyFBSH OR controlled_exit_hgHfSWQu2I))

output_checks.simple_check: if `mysql -u $DBMYSQLUSER --password=$DBMYSQLPASSWORD -h $DBMYSQLHOST -D $SS_DBMYSQLDATABASE -e "select * from Shippers;" | grep -q "BadShipper2\|ShipAttack"`; then true; else false; fi;
